CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adjusts the mix of the raw pattern over the whole screen (pick pattern color to the right >>>)
CONTROLS.NAME: pattern

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adjusts how much the logo will be mixed in (pick logo color to the right >>>)
CONTROLS.NAME: raw_logo

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Displace the media by the pattern, then choose how much to mix (pick displace color to the right >>>). Displace group controls only affect this mix.
CONTROLS.NAME: displace_logo

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Multiply the user media with the black and white pattern output (pick mask color to the right >>>)
CONTROLS.NAME: mask_logo

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color of the base pattern. Amount of mix controlled by pattern slider to the left <<<
CONTROLS.NAME: pattern_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color of the raw logo. Amount of mix controlled by raw logo slider to the left <<<
CONTROLS.NAME: logo_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color of the displaced logo. Amount of mix controlled by 'displace slider' to the left <<<
CONTROLS.NAME: displace_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color of the masked logo. Amount of mix controlled by 'mask logo' slider to the left <<<
CONTROLS.NAME: mask_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add a bright bloom effect when the bass hits
CONTROLS.NAME: bloom_mixer

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Amount of logo displacement on the X axis ('displace logo' mix must be on)
CONTROLS.NAME: displace_x

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Amount of logo displacement on the Y axis ('displace logo' mix must be on)
CONTROLS.NAME: displace_y

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Evenly displaces the media so it morphs without 'wiggling' back and forth.
CONTROLS.NAME: displace_mirror

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Makes it so you'll only where the logo did get displaced, instead of base logo and its displaced form.
CONTROLS.NAME: show_displaced_only

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Brightens the overall color on beat.
CONTROLS.NAME: flasher

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: add a bright bloom effect
CONTROLS.NAME: bloom_bass

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scaling of the grid cells
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Hit this after playing with the grid_size XY to force the grid back into perfect squares.
CONTROLS.NAME: squarize_grid

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This stacks an extra layer of pattern over the top for more detail and more chaos. If you are getting too many 'negative' or grungy colors, turn this back down to zero.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_2x_stack

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose the grid mode pattern. Each mode uses the output from pulse to fill the grid cells in a different way.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Used by some grid modes to control the complexity of the grid fill pattern.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_param_a

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Used by some grid modes to control the fill amount of the grid fill pattern.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_param_b

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically switches to random grid modes. Higher = more frequent, 0 = off
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_auto_transition

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scaling of the grid cells
CONTROLS.NAME: no_grid

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose the underlying pulse pattern that drives the grid animations. Each interacts with the pulse controls in its own way.
CONTROLS.NAME: pulse_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Used by some pulse modes to control the complexity of the underlying pulse pattern.
CONTROLS.NAME: pulse_param_a

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Used by some pulse modes to control the strength of the underlying pulse pattern.
CONTROLS.NAME: pulse_param_b

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Boost or reduce the overall pulse value, effectively fading the grid patterns fully in or out.
CONTROLS.NAME: pulse_boost_cut

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically switches to random pulse pattern modes. Higher = more frequent, 0 = off
CONTROLS.NAME: media_pulse_offset

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically switches to random pulse pattern modes. Higher = more frequent, 0 = off
CONTROLS.NAME: pulse_auto_transition

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This blurs the input media to create smoother pulse interactions with media. Especially useful with user_media option in pulses!!!
CONTROLS.NAME: media_blur

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Amount of feedback. Values around 0.9 are where you get the best trails.
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Moves the feedback on the Y axis.
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_rise_fall

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Zoom the feedback effect in or out.
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This interacts with the feedback slider. It lets you add extra beef to the feedback effect when dealing with low color values, but quickly maxes out if you have bright ones.
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_gain

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: run the output through an edge detection algorithm
CONTROLS.NAME: edge_detect

DESCRIPTION: Grid pattern generator with hundreds of unique pattern combinations. Excellent when used with black and white logos.
TITLE: Logo Grid Pulses_dup
